hikes.name: Alplochschlucht - Kirchle loop from Kehlegg
hikes.description: This route is mostly comprised of accessible pathways, though it does require sure-footedness. Additionally, the starting point of the tour is conveniently reachable using public transportation.
hikes.author: natureNick
hikes.gpx: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><gpx version="1.1" creator="Journey"><wpt lat="47.48751300895658" lon="9.721970059446186"><name>a</name></wpt><wpt lat="47.137424646293866" lon="12.325386919177907"><name>b</name></wpt></gpx>

hikes.name: Ludesch Dorfrundweg
hikes.description: The paths are predominantly accessible, but sure-footedness is necessary. Explore the picturesque surroundings and discover the village of Ludesch on this leisurely stroll.
hikes.author: maxi58
hikes.gpx: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><gpx version="1.1" creator="Journey"><wpt lat="47.48751300895658" lon="9.721970059446186"><name>a</name></wpt><wpt lat="47.137424646293866" lon="12.325386919177907"><name>b</name></wpt></gpx>

hikes.name: Lünersee (Südufer) - Lünersee loop from Brand
hikes.description: To embark on this journey, it's essential to possess alpine experience, as well as ensuring you have sure-footedness and sturdy footwear.
hikes.author: willi88
hikes.gpx: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><gpx version="1.1" creator="Journey"><wpt lat="47.48751300895658" lon="9.721970059446186"><name>a</name></wpt><wpt lat="47.137424646293866" lon="12.325386919177907"><name>b</name></wpt></gpx>

hikes.name: Bürser Schlucht - Schluchtweg loop from Bürs
hikes.description: While the majority of the paths are easily navigable, it's important to have good balance and sure-footedness. Additionally, the tour's starting point is conveniently accessible via public transportation.
hikes.author: trekTina
hikes.gpx: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><gpx version="1.1" creator="Journey"><wpt lat="47.48751300895658" lon="9.721970059446186"><name>a</name></wpt><wpt lat="47.137424646293866" lon="12.325386919177907"><name>b</name></wpt></gpx>

hikes.name: Bodenseepanorama - Bodensee loop from Bregenz
hikes.description: The trails are mostly accessible, but sure-footedness is essential.
hikes.author: alex82
hikes.gpx: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?><gpx version="1.1" creator="Journey"><wpt lat="47.48751300895658" lon="9.721970059446186"><name>a</name></wpt><wpt lat="47.137424646293866" lon="12.325386919177907"><name>b</name></wpt></gpx>
